content:
Trøndelag is a great destination for fishing enthusiasts as it offers a diverse range of fishing opportunities. Some of the best places for fishing in Trøndelag are:

1. Gaula River - Located between Holtalen and Stugudal, Gaula River is known for its salmon fishing. It is considered as one of the best salmon rivers in the world.

2. Orkla River - Orkla River is known for its trout and salmon fishing. It is located in the vicinity of Stjørdal and Trondheim.

3. Sylan Lakes - Sylan Lakes are situated south of Trondheim and are known for their population of trout, char, and grayling.

4. Stor-Elvdal River - Stor-Elvdal River is located east of Røros and is famous for its grayling fishing.

5. Oppdalsfjella Mountain Plateau - Oppdalsfjella Mountain Plateau is located near Oppdal and is known for its trout fishing.

The type of fish that can be caught in Trøndelag varies depending on the location. The most common fish species that can be caught in Trøndelag are salmon, trout, grayling, char, pike, and Arctic char.
